BalanceLines.Description: This function is used to check balance number of lines (repeated lines), including the exploded part-lines present, in a given part.
BalanceLines.Name: BalanceLines

BalanceSiblings.Description: This function is used to check balance number of lines (repeated line) only in the exploded part.
BalanceSiblings.Name: BalanceSiblings

BlankSiblings.Description: This function checks if there is any blank sibling or not.
BlankSiblings.Name: BlankSiblings

CurrentTableItemExplodeOwner.Description: This function evaluates the method in the context of the explode owner of the selected item.
CurrentTableItemExplodeOwner.Name: CurrentTableItemExplodeOwner

DashboardTotalTiles.Description: This function returns the current count of tiles in the Dashboard.
DashboardTotalTiles.Name: DashboardTotalTiles

DoExplosionsFit.Description: In case of printing, if a line is exploded then this function can be used to check whether the exploded part fits in the given page. It returns logical expression Yes if it is true.
DoExplosionsFit.Name: DoExplosionsFit

ExplodeLevel.Description: This function checks the level of Explosion.
ExplodeLevel.Name: ExplodeLevel

ExplodeOwner.Description: Can be used to extract the method of the Explode owner using the field name from where it is Exploded.
ExplodeOwner.Name: ExplodeOwner

FirstLineNumber.Description: This function returns 1 if no repeated lines exist. Otherwise the number of first repeated line for that part is returned. If you have 4 lines in a part, of which 4th one is repeated line, then $$FirstLineNumber returns 4.
FirstLineNumber.Name: FirstLineNumber

FocusedTileTitle.Description: This function returns the name of the currently active tile within the Dashboard.
FocusedTileTitle.Name: FocusedTileTitle

GetLongestLineLength.Description: This function gives the length of the longest line in the given text. In text separated by '\n', it'll give length of longest text block without a newline.
GetLongestLineLength.Name: GetLongestLineLength

HasLinesDeleted.Description: This function is used for verifying whether any lines are deleted from the report.
HasLinesDeleted.Name: HasLinesDeleted

HelpModuleId.Description: This function returns Module Id of the help if defined in the current context of report or menu
HelpModuleId.Name: HelpModuleId

InAcceptMode.Description: This function verifies if the current Print Action was a result of an Acceptance of the previous report (for Print After Save Scenarios).
InAcceptMode.Name: InAcceptMode

InAlterMode.Description: This function returns 'Yes' only if the Report is accessed through a Menu/Button/Key with the action as 'Alter'.
InAlterMode.Name: InAlterMode

InAppendMode.Description: If you are creating a new voucher in append mode (Alt + A) from Day book or any voucher Register, then it checks whether the current Voucher Creation is in Append mode or not. The new voucher number will be an incremental number of the voucher from where it is appended.
InAppendMode.Name: InAppendMode

InBrowserExport.Description: It checks if the report is being displayed in the browser. It returns 'yes' if the report is being displayed.
InBrowserExport.Name: InBrowserExport

InBrowserPeriodChange.Description: It checks if the report is being displayed in the browser after a period change. It returns 'yes' if the report is being displayed.
InBrowserPeriodChange.Name: InBrowserPeriodChange

InChangeView.Description: This function returns whether the current report is opened from Change View Action.
InChangeView.Name: InChangeView

InCreateMode.Description: This function returns 'Yes' only if the report is Created through a Menu/Button/Key with the action as 'Create'.
InCreateMode.Name: InCreateMode

InDisplayMode.Description: This function returns 'Yes' only if a particular report is accessed through a Menu/Button/Key with the action as 'Display'.
InDisplayMode.Name: InDisplayMode

InDuplicateMode.Description: This function returns 'Yes' only if the voucher is created through a Button/Key with the action as 'Duplicate'. In Day book or any voucher Register, if we create a duplicate voucher (Alt + 2), then this function returns 'Yes'. It checks whether the current Voucher is in Duplication Mode.
InDuplicateMode.Name: InDuplicateMode

InDynamicAlterMode.Description: To check if the Parent of the current report is in Alter mode. It checks whether the previous or Parent Report, like any Main Report of any configuration report or any Subform is in Alter Mode or not.
InDynamicAlterMode.Name: InDynamicAlterMode

InEditMode.Description: This function is used to check if the selected mode is in Edit Mode. It checks if the current report is running in create mode or alter mode, it is like a combine function of $$InCreateMode and $$InAlter mode.
InEditMode.Name: InEditMode

InExecuteMode.Description: To check if the selected mode is in Execute Mode. It checks if current report is executed by Execute action of a Button or Key.
InExecuteMode.Name: InExecuteMode

InExportAction.Description: This function verifies if the selected mode is Export Action.
InExportAction.Name: InExportAction

InExportMode.Description: This function verifies if the selected mode is in the Export Mode.
InExportMode.Name: InExportMode

InfoParam.Description: This function extracts the value of the string from the actions message report and query report which is to be set in Query or Message box.
InfoParam.Name: InfoParam

InfoString.Description: This function extracts the string from the actions message report and query report which is to be set in Query or Message box.
InfoString.Name: InfoString

InInsertMode.Description: In Day book or any Voucher Register, if we are creating a new voucher in Insert mode (Alt + I), It checks whether the current Voucher Creation is in Insert mode or not. The new voucher number will be a decremented number of the voucher from where it is inserted.
InInsertMode.Name: InInsertMode

InMailAction.Description: This function returns 'Yes' only if the Report is accessed through a Button/Key with the action as 'Mail Report'.
InMailAction.Name: InMailAction

InMailMode.Description: This function returns TRUE only if a particular report is accessed through a Menu/Button/Key with Mail action else returns FALSE.
InMailMode.Name: InMailMode

InMobileBrowserExport.Description: It checks if the report is being displayed in a mobile browser. It returns 'yes' if the report is being displayed.
InMobileBrowserExport.Name: InMobileBrowserExport

InPrintAction.Description: This function verifies if the selected mode is Print Action.
InPrintAction.Name: InPrintAction

InTrueColorMode.Description: If the current color quality for the Monitor is set to 'True Color' (e.g. 24bit, 32 bit etc) then the function returns 'Yes' else if the color quality is set to '16 bit', '256 colors' etc., then it returns 'No'.
InTrueColorMode.Name: InTrueColorMode

InUploadAction.Description: This function returns 'Yes' only if the Report is accessed through a Button/Key with the action as 'Upload Report'.
InUploadAction.Name: InUploadAction

InWhatsAppAction.Description: This function checks whether the selected mode is WhatsApp action or not.
InWhatsAppAction.Name: InWhatsAppAction

InWhatsAppMode.Description: This function checks whether the selected mode is WhatsApp or not.
InWhatsAppMode.Name: InWhatsAppMode

IsCaseToggled.Description: This function is used to check if the field case has been toggled or not.
IsCaseToggled.Name: IsCaseToggled

IsCheckAlwaysInDashboardTiles.Description: This function is used to check whether any tile within the Dashboard contains the “Check Always” attribute. It is intended for use at the preload check level of a Dashboard report.
IsCheckAlwaysInDashboardTiles.Name: IsCheckAlwaysInDashboardTiles

IsEdited.Description: The value of the field changed manualy it returns 'Yes' else returns 'No'.
IsEdited.Name: IsEdited

IsExploded.Description: This function checks whether the passed part name is exploded or not. If the part is exploded then it returns 'Yes' else 'No'. It also checks whether the current part is exploded or not if no parameter is passed.
IsExploded.Name: IsExploded

IsExportable.Description: This function checks if the Export attribute has been enabled or not for the current object.
IsExportable.Name: IsExportable

IsFieldEdited.Description: This function states if the field has been edited or not.
IsFieldEdited.Name: IsFieldEdited

IsFirstChildOnNextPage.Description: This function returns a logical expression 'Yes' if a line is exploded and if first child or sub object apparently prints on the next page.
IsFirstChildOnNextPage.Name: IsFirstChildOnNextPage

IsFirstInPart.Description: This function checks if the line in the part is first. This returns 'Yes' in case it is true.
IsFirstInPart.Name: IsFirstInPart

IsFromTriggerReport.Description: This function returns whether a 'trigger' report was opened for context selection before opening the current report.
IsFromTriggerReport.Name: IsFromTriggerReport

IsLastLine.Description: This function is used to check is this the last scroll line in printing.
IsLastLine.Name: IsLastLine

IsLastPage.Description: This function is used to check is this the last page in printing.
IsLastPage.Name: IsLastPage

IsLastVertPart.Description: This function is used to check is this the last part in printing.
IsLastVertPart.Name: IsLastVertPart

IsNextActiveSibling.Description: To check if the subsequent object is the object of the current collection used in the current explosion.(Ignores removed lines (Alt+R))
IsNextActiveSibling.Name: IsNextActiveSibling

IsNextSibling.Description: To check if the subsequent object is the object of the current collection used in the current explosion.
IsNextSibling.Name: IsNextSibling

IsOpeningBal.Description: To check whether this line is opening line added due to OpeningBal attribute defined in Form for balancing.
IsOpeningBal.Name: IsOpeningBal

IsRepeatColumnContext.Description: This function specifies whether the auto-report was opened when cursor present in column of parent report.
IsRepeatColumnContext.Name: IsRepeatColumnContext

IsReportInEditMode.Description: To check if the report is in edit mode.
IsReportInEditMode.Name: IsReportInEditMode

IsRightToLeftLangScript.Description: This function checks language script is Right-To-Left or not
IsRightToLeftLangScript.Name: IsRightToLeftLangScript

IsSiblingExploded.Description: This function checks if the sibling has an exploded part or not.
IsSiblingExploded.Name: IsSiblingExploded

IsTriggerReport.Description: This function returns whether the report is opened from 'Trigger' attribute of collection while doing actions like Display Collection, Alter Collection etc.
IsTriggerReport.Name: IsTriggerReport

LastLineNumber.Description: This function retrieves Last Line Number of the part in the page. It retrieves the Last Line Number of a Part in each Page of printing. Supposing the Part is repeated with a collection having 59 items, in first page part is able to fit only 47 items, it retrieves 47 in the first page and 59 in the second page.
LastLineNumber.Name: LastLineNumber

LineNumber.Description: Gives the Line Number of the specified line in a page.
LineNumber.Name: LineNumber

LoadKeyboardLayout.Description: This function load specified languge keyboard layout
LoadKeyboardLayout.Name: LoadKeyboardLayout

Loword.Description: This function returns language ID from locale ID
Loword.Name: Loword

NextActiveSibling.Description: To refer to Next Line's Field Name or Method Name.(Ignores removed lines (Alt+R))
NextActiveSibling.Name: NextActiveSibling

NextSibling.Description: To refer to Next Line's Field Name or Method Name.
NextSibling.Name: NextSibling

NumExplosions.Description: Gives the Number of Explosions taken place for a line.
NumExplosions.Name: NumExplosions

NumFlowLinesCanFit.Description: This function is used to get number of balance flow lines available to print.
NumFlowLinesCanFit.Name: NumFlowLinesCanFit

NumLanguages.Description: This function returns number of Keyboard / Input Languages supported.
NumLanguages.Name: NumLanguages

NumUILanguages.Description: This function returns number of UI / Display Languages supported.
NumUILanguages.Name: NumUILanguages

ParentIsMenu.Description: This function checks whether the current report is called by a Menu Object or not.
ParentIsMenu.Name: ParentIsMenu

PrevLine.Description: To refer to previous Line's Field Name or Method Name.
PrevLine.Name: PrevLine

PrevLineField.Description: To refer to the value from the same field of the previous line.
PrevLineField.Name: PrevLineField

PrevLineVisible.Description: To check if the previous line stated is displayed.
PrevLineVisible.Name: PrevLineVisible

TableExplodeLevel.Description: This function returns the level of Explosion for the current Table Item.
TableExplodeLevel.Name: TableExplodeLevel

TableExplodeOwner.Description: This function facilitates to extract method value from the parent collection of the exploded table/collection. The function evaluates the value while the Table is constructed.
TableExplodeOwner.Name: TableExplodeOwner

TopLine.Description: To refer to Top Line's Field Name or Method Name.
TopLine.Name: TopLine

ValidateandGetKeyboard.Description: This function validates and loads specified languge keyboard layout
ValidateandGetKeyboard.Name: ValidateandGetKeyboard

WindowHeight.Description: This function returns the current window height.
WindowHeight.Name: WindowHeight

WindowWidth.Description: This function returns the current window width.
WindowWidth.Name: WindowWidth
